department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Aren is a 5 year games industry veteran and is currently the lead character artist at Day 1 Studios in Chicago.  Before entering the industry in 2005 He worked as an instructor in the Computer Animation division at Full Sail University in Orlando, FL teaching in the Character Modeling class.  Throughout his tenure in the industry, Aren has worked on numerous game titles across all major platforms, including PC, Xbox360 and Ps3.
